title: Urgently Hiring For Integrated Developer
tagsAndSkills: Orchestration,Mapping,Dell Boomi,Rest Api Integration,Integrated Development Environment,Integration,ERP,Boomi
jobDescription:
Looking for Integration Developer with 2-3 years of experience in using Dell Boomi and Workato. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining integration solutions that enable seamless data connectivity across various applications and platforms.

This role requires a solid understanding of integration patterns, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to collaborate with various teams to deliver robust solutions.


Skill requirements:

  • Design, implement, and maintain integration processes using Dell Boomi and Workato platforms.
  • Develop complex workflows and orchestrations that integrate cloud and on-premise applications.
  • Create and manage RESTful and SOAP APIs for integration purposes.
  • Implement data transformations, mappings, and error handling mechanisms to ensure data integrity and reliability.
  • Utilize connectors and adaptors within Dell Boomi and Workato to integrate with a variety of systems, including ERPs, CRMs, and databases.
  • Set up and manage monitoring tools to ensure integration processes are running smoothly.
  • Diagnose and resolve integration issues, optimizing performance and resolving data discrepancies promptly.
  • Work closely with business analysts, system architects, and other stakeholders to gather integration requirements and specifications.
  • Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively.
  • Document integration processes, data flows, and technical configurations comprehensively.
  • Establish and advocate for best practices in integration design, development, and maintenance.
  • Manage integration projects, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and meet the quality standards.
  • Proactively identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure project success.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in integration technologies and methodologies.
  • Identify opportunities for process improvements and implement changes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
  • Ensure integration processes comply with security standards and regulatory requirements.
  • Implement data protection measures and maintain the confidentiality and integrity of data.
  • 2-3 years of hands-on experience with Dell Boomi/Workato integration tools.
  • Strong knowledge of integration patterns, web services (REST/SOAP), and SOA architectures.
  • Experience with cloud-based integrations and hybrid cloud environments.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities, with strong attention to detail.
  • Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, for effective collaboration and documentation.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with strong interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to mentor and guide junior team members, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.

Education:

  • BCA, MCA, B.tech, M.tech

Job Types:

  • Full-time, Permanent

Salary:

  • As per industrial standards

Schedule:

  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday - 5 days working.
  • Saturday - Sunday off

Experience:

  • total work: 5-10 year

Ability to Commute:

  • Ghansoli, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Ability to Relocate:

  • Ghansoli, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location:

  • In person

How to Apply:

  • Send your updated cv on apurva.bhurke@icruxsystem.com or connect with me on 8097032305.
